body: Update, even better news! They are still making new stuff and even are still working on this series, the last thing they posted of this series was December 31, 2020.

Just used Google's new image translator and good news, they seem to be making more and it's costing them less for it. At least that's what the 4th last page says, but that was like 2019 so they may not have made anymore. I'll check their pixiv account now
